title: Rs 7 lakh a night: Indians ready to pay lakhs for Dec 31 hotel stay
description: Dec 31 Hotel Prices: Rents at Leela Palaces Hotels & Resorts properties in Delhi, Jaipur and Udaipur are at record highs, a company spokesperson said. The Leela Palace Udaipur, which has no rooms available for December 31, was charging about â‚¹1,06,200 for a night's stay on Christmas on Booking.com previously.
